text:
@realDonaldTrump Minnesota, Texas, Florida, Georgia report increases in coronavirus cases/ highest number of single day cases as they re-open their states. Governors attribute rise in cases to re-opening of businesses.

So...ah...why do you think re-opening is such a great idea? IT KILLS PEOPLE.
